title: [Large-scale] Effective Utilization of Real-time Voice Feedback in Simulation-based Science Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and basic computer/tablet operation skills
context.additional_context: Simulation training environment utilizing personal devices, combined with offline workshops and online practice.

learning_goals: In a simulation environment, learners improve accuracy in solving complex scientific problems by over 30% with real-time voice feedback.
Based on feedback, learners revise the decision-making process two or more times to derive optimal experimental designs.
In the summative assessment, learners write a scientific experiment design report applying simulation training experiences and achieve over 80 points.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
